name: MAEGA Sale
title: SALES AND SPECIALS
discription: It’s the biggest sale of the year. Save up to 75% on great games and earn Epic Coupons until June 17!

name: FREE GAME
title: WEEKLY FREE TITLE
discription: The Vault Is Open: Claim Frostpunk for FREE until June 10!

name: Rocket League Login Reward
title: REDEEM FOR FREE
discription: To drive away in these classic SARPBC-10 Wheels, simply log-in to Rocket League through EGS any time between June 3 and June 17!

name: Genshin Impact
title: WISHLIST
discription: Grab a free bonus code “GenshinEpic” and get ready for your open-world adventure in Teyvat, starting June 8th!

name: ARK: Genesis
title: COMPLETE THE STORY
discription: Everything your tribe has built, tamed, and fought for has led to this final challenge.

name: Chivalry 2
title: LAST CHANCE TO PRE-PURCHASE
discription: Pre-purchase before June 8 to get an exclusive bonus weapon variant.
